data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Phetchaburi.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Phetchaburi, Thailand
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Phetchaburi, Thailand humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Phetchaburi, Thailand to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 499,800 people living in Phetchaburi, Thailand. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Dawei, Tavoyan people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Lord, we pray for the believers in Phetchaburi, Thailand to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Phetchaburi, Thailand.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Phetchaburi a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;
